lino licuanan

            function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
            gtag('js', new Date());
          
            gtag('config', 'G-9MHZYW9421');
          
          
          Bio
          Hi, I’m Lino Licuanan. I am a product manager with 3 years of experience in the Philippine fintech space orchestrating product strategy from concept to execution.
          Particularly interested in products where data plays a central role in delivering superior CX, returns, and social benefit. Happy to consult with organizations on how to go about driving that.
          Proficient in R & SQL for practical data science & analytics. Graduating MSc Industrial Engineering student @ UP Diliman by end of 2022. In my free time I boulder, go night running, and listen to podcasts.
          
          
          Experience
          
          PayMaya Philippines, Inc.
          Product Management, Identity & Access Management | 2/2022 - Present
          
          
          First Circle Growth Finance Corporation
          Lead Product Management, Revolving Credit Line | 9/2021 - 1/2022
          Data Product Management, Underwriting System | 1/2021 - 8/2021
          Data Strategy, Acquisition | 7/2019 - 12/2020
          
          
          Jollibee Foods Corporation
          Management Associate, Future Leaders Program | 7/2018 - 12/2018
          
          
          
          Education
          
          University of the Philippines, Diliman
          MS Industrial Engineering, Human Factors Specialization | 8/2020 - Present
          BS Economics, magna cum laude | 7/2014 - 6/2018
